analyzed: kun nas gus pa dang gnod pa byed pa dang rab tu thob ba la yang lat sogs a'atma ne pa da rnams 'gyur te /

original: dza t'a bhi r'a l'a pa ya te /
analyzed: dza t'a bhi r'a l'a pa ya te /

original: shye no barti k'a mull'a pa ya te /
analyzed: shye no barti k'a mull'a pa ya te /

original: sogs so / ` / nyi bh'i 'jigs pa la'o zhes ba la ni tsa /
analyzed: sogs so / ` / nyi bh'i 'jigs pa la'o zhes ba la ni tsa /

original: bi bhi terhe tu bha ye /
analyzed: bi bhi terhe tu bha ye /

original: 'jigs pa'i rgyu brjod pa las bi bhi ti'i mtha' nitsa pha rol la a'at du yang na bsgyur ro //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i rgyu brjod pa las bi bhi ti'i mtha' nitsa pha rol la a'at du yang na bsgyur ro //
translated: with respect to the other.

original: 'grel par lung drangs pa /
analyzed: 'grel par lung drangs pa /
translated: The commentary cites a verse:

original: (ral pa can rnams pa kun nas gus bar 'dod /
analyzed: (ral pa can rnams pa kun nas gus bar 'dod /

original: khras co ka la gnod pa byed bar 'dod /
analyzed: khras co ka la gnod pa byed bar 'dod /

original: khyod su thob bar 'dod/) pra yo dza k'adbha yam tsa b'a tsyam /
analyzed: khyod su thob bar 'dod/) pra yo dza k'adbha yam tsa b'a tsyam /

original: 'jigs pa'i sbyor ba las kyang brjod do //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i sbyor ba las kyang brjod do //
translated: [The king] is also described as applying fear.

original: 'jigs pa'i rgyur ma zad 'jigs pa sbyor ba las kyang bi bhe ti'i ni tsa pha rol la a'at du yang na bsgyur ro //
analyzed: 'jigs pa'i rgyur ma zad 'jigs pa sbyor ba las kyang bi bhe ti'i ni tsa pha rol la a'at du yang na bsgyur ro //
translated: Not only as a cause of fear, but also from applying fear, from vibheti, the suffix ṇic is added to the object, or the suffix ṇ to the subject.

original: bh'ismyorhe tu bha ye /🔽bh'i smi dag las 'jigs ba'i rgyu la'o //
analyzed: bh'ismyorhe tu bha ye / bh'i smi dag las 'jigs ba'i rgyu la'o //

original: bh'i dang shmi cung zad rgod pa dag las 'jigs pa'i rgyu brjod pa la tang rnams sbyor te /
analyzed: bh'i dang shmi cung zad rgod pa dag las 'jigs pa'i rgyu brjod pa la tang rnams sbyor te /

original: bi bhe ti'i 'jigs pa'i rgyu la 'os a'at du bsgyur /
analyzed: bi bhe ti'i 'jigs pa'i rgyu la 'os a'at du bsgyur /

original: aarti hr'i sogs kyis puka a'a ga ma byin pas /
analyzed: aarti hr'i sogs kyis puka a'a ga ma byin pas /

original: bh'a pi zhes grub ba la /
analyzed: bh'a pi zhes grub ba la /

analyzed: (lring)...aa bh'a pa yi shyata /

analyzed: sogs sam / yang na /

analyzed: bh'i'i nitsa pha rol la 'jigs pa'i rgyu la shuka a'a ga ma 'gyur te /

analyzed: shuka byin pas / (lat)...bh'i sha ya te /

analyzed: (lut)...aa bhi sha te /

analyzed: sogs so / ` /shmi cung zad rgod pa la'o zhes pa la nitsa sbyar /

analyzed: ni tyam sma ya te:/

original: sma ya ti'i rtag tu'o //
analyzed: sma ya ti'i rtag tu'o //

analyzed: 'jigs pa'i rgyu dang sbyor ba na /

analyzed: a'i a'ata / aarti hr'i sogs kyis buka a'a ga ma byin pas /

analyzed: sm'a pi zhes grub pa la /

translated: ༼ལིང༽ “ca pāyate”🔽༼ལོཏ༽ “ca pāyatu”🔽༼ལང༽ “a ca pāyata”🔽༼ལུང༽ “a cī carati”🔽༼ལིཏ༽ “ca pāyām ca karā”🔽༼ལུཏ༽ “ca pāyīta”🔽༼སྨོན་ལིང༽ “ca pāyāt”🔽༼ལྲིཏ༽ “ca pāyīṣyati”🔽༼ལྲིང༽ “a ca pāyīṣyati”🔽and so forth.🔽Or, by increasing the a cī ni,🔽༼ལཏ༽ “ca yāyate”🔽༼ལུང༽ “a cī cayati”🔽and so forth.🔽“Spura” is for “to spread.”🔽For ni and ci, the la is appropriate.🔽

analyzed: 'phel ba byas bas /

original: gnyis brjod pa'i aa bh'a sa'i au yig ni bu ste ba sde dang yan so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams dang dza yig dang aa yig rnams gang rung zhig pha rol na yod na ai yig tu bsgyur te /

translated: If any of the letters of the va group and the ya group are on the other side, they are changed to i.

original: skabs 'dir aaka ma phyis pa la mang ba la tsang pha rol la san bzhin nos /
analyzed: skabs 'dir aaka ma phyis pa la mang ba la tsang pha rol la san bzhin nos /
translated: In this case, the ak is not removed, and the many are like the san on the other side.

original: san dang 'dra ba'i bya ba 'jug pas /
analyzed: san dang 'dra ba'i bya ba 'jug pas /
translated: Since the action is like the san,

analyzed: au air bsgyur / yang ba'i ring po 'os de ring por de ring por bsgyur /
translated: the u is changed to i.🔽Also, the long ā is changed to ā.

original: ni phyis pas /
analyzed: ni phyis pas /
translated: Since the ni is removed,

original: aa b'i bha bata /
analyzed: aa b'i bha bata /

original: sogs dang / la yig lhag ma rnams la /
analyzed: sogs dang / la yig lhag ma rnams la /

original: (lit)...bh'a ba y'am tsa k'a ra /

original: ` // gnyis pa byings byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen san gyi 'jug yul rnams bshad par bya ste /🔽dh'a to:karma na:sa m'a na kartri k'a ditstsh'a y'am b'a /
analyzed: ` // gnyis pa byings byings su bsgrub pa'i rkyen san gyi 'jug yul rnams bshad par bya ste / dh'a to:karma na:sa m'a na kartri k'a ditstsh'a y'am b'a /
translated: The second, the conditions of the affixation of the verbal roots, will now be explained.🔽Dhātoḥ karmaṇi samānakartṛkādiṣṭāyāṃ vā

original: byings las las dang 'dod pa byed pa po mnyam pa las yang na'o //🔽byings las pha rol tu bya ba'i las dang 'dod pa'i don byed pa po mnyam @378a * //
analyzed: byings las las dang 'dod pa byed pa po mnyam pa las yang na'o // byings las pha rol tu bya ba'i las dang 'dod pa'i don byed pa po mnyam @378a * //
translated: From the verbal root, the action, the desire, the agent, the equality, and again.🔽From the verbal root, the action, the desired object, the agent, the equality,

original: pa ste / byed pa po dang bcas pa rtogs par byed pa'i don la san yang na 'gyur te /
analyzed: pa ste / byed pa po dang bcas pa rtogs par byed pa'i don la san yang na 'gyur te /
translated: and the object of the action to be done, the affix saṃ is added to the meaning of the verbal root, which is to be understood as having an agent.

original: aa da za ba /🔽san sbyar / sung san dag la gha sli 'os gha slir bsgyur li phyis /
analyzed: aa da za ba / san sbyar / sung san dag la gha sli 'os gha slir bsgyur li phyis /
translated: Ada, to eat.🔽Saṃ, to connect. Suṃ, saṃ, to those two, ghasli is appropriate, ghasli is changed to li,

original: san yang dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod /🔽ku ha dag gi tsu 'os /
analyzed: san yang dag la 'os byings gnyis brjod / ku ha dag gi tsu 'os /
translated: and saṃ is changed to the verbal root.🔽Ku, ha, to those two, cu is appropriate.

original: gha dzha aa bhya sa'i tsar 'ang 'os /
analyzed: gha dzha aa bhya sa'i tsar 'ang 'os /
translated: Gha, jha, ava, bhya, si, to those four, ca is also appropriate.

original: dzha dza / san la ait 'os /
analyzed: dzha dza / san la ait 'os /
translated: Jha, ja, to saṃ, ita is appropriate.

original: air bsgyur / khar la tsar 'os sa\ tar\ bsgyur bas /
analyzed: air bsgyur / khar la tsar 'os sa\ tar\ bsgyur bas /
translated: Ita is changed to i, to kṣa, ca is appropriate, and is changed to ta.

original: dzi ghat+sa zhes grub pa la lat sog sbyar /
analyzed: dzi ghat+sa zhes grub pa la lat sog sbyar /
translated: Thus, jighāṃsati is formed, and lat is connected.

original: byed pa po la shap /
analyzed: byed pa po la shap /
translated: To the agent, śap is added.

original: rjes 'brel phyis nas /
analyzed: rjes 'brel phyis nas /
translated: The suffix is added later.

original: aat la yon tan la 'os gnyis dag gi gcig pha rol gyi gzugs su bsgyur ba sogs byas pas /🔽(lat)...dzi ghat+sa ti /🔽(ling)...dzi ghat+se ta /

original: (lot)...dzi ghat+sa tu /
analyzed: (lot)...dzi ghat+sa tu /

analyzed: (lang)...aa dzi ghat+sa ta / sogs dang / lung la /

analyzed: sogs so / lit la k'as sogs kyis a'am sbyar /

analyzed: sogs so // lut la ait byin aa phyis pas / dzi ghat+si t'a /

analyzed: dzi ghat+si t'a si /

original: sogs so / smon pa'i ling la /🔽dzi ghat+syat / dzi ghat+sy'ast'am /
analyzed: sogs so / smon pa'i ling la / dzi ghat+syat / dzi ghat+sy'ast'am /
translated: The root lit means “to eat.”🔽The root lit means “to eat.”

analyzed: dzi ghat+sy'a su:/ sogs so //

analyzed: lrit la / ait byin aa phyis pas /

analyzed: dzi ghat+si shya ti /
translated: Jighāsyati.🔽And so forth.

original: sogs dang / de bzhin du /
analyzed: sogs dang / de bzhin du /
translated: Similarly,🔽in the long,

original: lring la / aa dzi ghat+si shyat /
analyzed: lring la / aa dzi ghat+si shyat /
translated: ajighāsyati.🔽And so forth.

analyzed: sogs so/` / d'i da zad pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar gnyis brjod thung ngur bsgyur pas / di d'ish zhes pa la lat sogs tang rnams sbyar bas. (lat)...di d'i she te /

analyzed: (lit)...di d'i sh'am tsa kre / (lut)...di d'i shi t'a /

original: (lring)...aa di d'i shi shyat /
analyzed: (lring)...aa di d'i shi shyat /

original: sogs dang / 'grel par lung drangs pa /🔽d'i da:san+yatpam ke tse dv'a /🔽d'ing gi san la a'a nid 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o /
analyzed: sogs dang / 'grel par lung drangs pa / d'i da:san+yatpam ke tse dv'a / d'ing gi san la a'a nid 'ga' zhig tu yang na'o /

analyzed: d'ing gi san pha rol la aa nyid du bsgyur ba skabs 'gar yang na bar bya ste /

analyzed: di dyut ai san zhes pa la /

analyzed: ra lo byu pa dh'a ddha l'a de samshtsa /

analyzed: au ai au pa dh'a hal dang po dang ra la las san 'ang ngo /

analyzed: byings hal dang po can ai yig dang au yig gang rung zhig au pa dh'a na yod /

original: kit kyi phyogs la yon tan mi byed /
analyzed: kit kyi phyogs la yon tan mi byed /

analyzed: di dyu tisha 'am /

analyzed: de dyu ti sha t'am...(lot)...di dyo ti sha t'am / aa di dyu ti sha ta/...(lang)...aa di dyo ti sha ta /

original: nil 'ang san tsang dag la 'os yang na ai g'ang du bsgyur /
analyzed: nil 'ang san tsang dag la 'os yang na ai g'ang du bsgyur /

analyzed: san la ait 'os /

analyzed: (lang)...aa dhya dzi g'a pa yi shat /

analyzed: dzi g'a pa yi shi shya te /

analyzed: byings aatsa'i mtha' can rnams kyi mtha' dang han gam dag gi au ba dh'a rnams san pha rol la ring por bsgyur te /

original: bri br'ir bsgyur /
analyzed: bri br'ir bsgyur /

analyzed: san la a'it yang na 'os ait yang na bar byas /

analyzed: (lung)...aa bu b'ursh'i ta /

analyzed: (lring)...aa bu b'urshi shyata /

original: sogs dang / aita'i phyogs la /
analyzed: sogs dang / aita'i phyogs la /

original: gnyis brjod / ri'i aata dang san la aita /
analyzed: gnyis brjod / ri'i aata dang san la aita /

original: byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas /
analyzed: byings thams cad pa sogs kyis yon tan byas pas /

original: (lat)...bi ba ri sha ti /
analyzed: (lat)...bi ba ri sha ti /
translated: The suffix -tā is added to the root viprati, meaning “to be divided.”

original: (lung)...aa bi ba ri sh'i ta /🔽(lit)...bi ba ri sh'a tsa k'a ra /🔽sogs sam / (lat)...bi ba r'i sha ti /🔽(lung)...aa bi ba r'i sh'ita /🔽(lit)...bi ba r'i sh'am tsa k'a ra /

original: sogs so / ` /du krinya byed pa la'o zhes pa la san sbyar /

original: r'i'i aan la ra pha @380b rol gnyis /🔽ku ha dag gi tsu /
analyzed: r'i'i aan la ra pha @380b rol gnyis / ku ha dag gi tsu /

original: sam sngon du bzhag / ka ro ti'i sam pa ri au pa sogs kyi mdos ka'i sngon du sut a'a gam byin /
analyzed: sam sngon du bzhag / ka ro ti'i sam pa ri au pa sogs kyi mdos ka'i sngon du sut a'a gam byin /
